All the ethnobotanical indices are founded on the basic structure of the ethnobotanical information: informant “ i” mentions the use of the species “ s” in the use-category “ u.” The event resulting from the combination of these three variables has been defined as a use-report [ 25]. For studying the cultural importance of plants, one of the most commonly used tools is the total number of use-reports (UR) for each species, i.e., fixing the variable “ s.” This can be mathematically expressed as:
